ygData.subject: Re: New to the warrior thing.
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are planning on going dual wield, try and keep your piercing up.  I kept my 1H blunt up as well, but then I look through a list of 1h blunts available
ygData.messageBody:
If you are planning on going dual wield, try and keep your piercing up. I
kept my 1H blunt up as well, but then I look through a list of 1h blunts
available and found out they sucked or a warrior couldn't use them. They're
are some very nice Piercing weapons however. Dual wielding one of these
with a 1H slash can be very nasty.

P.S.-- since you are playing a Dark Elf (my race preference), if I ever see
you grouping with or helping out any races besides the Evil Triad, I will
hunt you down and kill you. Otherwise, welcome to the Dark Side of EQ.

Kindrael
